review.title: “An elegantly flopped company with neither glue nor screws!”
review.pros: Pros – Good for the freshers as they can will learn more with technical and troubleshooting knowledge.
review.cons: Cons – Not for the experience. Poor management and no scope of growth for the employee.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please do think the employee(s) as a family and provide the necessary benefits and equal opportunities so that they will remain loyal to the company. Hiring new inexperience candidates and ignoring the experience ones will bring no good fortune for the company and the Business.

review.title: “Good company to gain Experience and to know about the corporate world.”
review.pros: Pros – The Best thing about the company is that it teaches a lot of things for the fresher who steps in to the corporate world. Especially the Explore talent process is the best process were the work is fun, once you start making good sales you will be kings for yourself.
review.cons: Cons – The only bad thing abt the company is it gives growth with good positions with no increment in the salary..!!!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Should work on employes satisfaction so that attrition rate can be decreased.
